        <general>
          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Final Account and Balance Sheet</string>
            <string language="es">Balance general y cuentas finales</string>
            <string language="ga">Cuntas Deiridh agus Clár Comhardaithe</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schlußrechnung und Bilanz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Compte final et bilan</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Cliente final e folha de contrapeso</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Cliente finale e bilancio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τελικός απολογισμός και ισολογισμός</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This Quiz will test students understanding of Final Accounts</string>
            <string language="es">Este cuestionario comprobará la comprensión de los estudiantes de las cuentas finales.</string>
            <string language="ga">Tástálfaidh an Tráth na gCeist seo tuiscint ar Chuntais Dheiridh.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Business Studies</string>
            <string language="es">Estudios empresariales</string>
            <string language="ga">Staidéir Ghnó</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieser Quiz prüft das Kursteilnehmerverstehen von 
Schlußrechnungen</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce jeu testera l'arrangement d'étudiants des 
comptes finals</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este quiz testará a compreensão dos estudantes de
clientes finais</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo quiz verificherà capire degli allievi dei 
clienti finali</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτός ο διαγωνισμός γνώσεων θα εξετάσει την κατανόηση
σπουδαστών των τελικών απολογισμών</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geschäft Studien</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Études d'Affaires</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
